Reference

Global Fishing Watch

Extract fishing effort data.

get_cropped_fishing()

Import Fishing Effort Within Specified Areas

jacks_lazy_avg()

Map GFW data for a geartype, above a minimum level of fishing activity

jacks_lazy_animation()

Animate a map of GFW data for a geartype, above a minimum level of fishing activity

jacks_polar_static()

Map GFW data for a geartype, above a minimum level of fishing activity (polar projection)

jacks_polar_animate()

Animate a map of GFW data for a geartype, above a minimum level of fishing activity (polar projection)

Misc

Other data extractors for now.

get_SPM()

Extract Suspended Particulate Matter data from Globcolour

fill_in()

Fill missing values in a vector

Unit conversions

Helper functions to avoid introducing bugs when switching between scales

micro_to_full() full_to_micro() micro_to_milli() milli_to_micro() milli_to_full() full_to_milli() l_to_m3() m3_to_l() sec_to_day() day_to_sec() shortwave_to_einstein()

Helper functions for common unit conversions

Sediment

Water movements

Align tidal and wave data from different sources.

reshape_SINMOD()

Subset a SINMOD file to depth-averaged water velocities in an area.

Sediment properties

Calculate derived properties from sediment fractions.

mud_to_permeability()

Calculate sediment permeability

D50_to_porosity()

Calculate sediment porosity
